data.name: archer_desc
data.value: In war, the one who can manage archers often wins. This class is characterized by a huge range of the shot, but it is fragile and it is worth keeping a distance.

data.name: archer_primary_desc
data.value: The archer performs a bow shot for {0} + damage [dice count]

data.name: archer_skill_desc
data.value: The archer uses a magic essence to direct the arrow to the opponent's weak point and deals {0} + damage [dice count]

data.name: assassin_desc
data.value: An agile killer waiting for his victims to be able to end their lives at a convenient time. The razor-sharp dagger and the special uniform allow him to be extremely fast and precise in inflicting death. However, it is not worth exposing him to the fight with the whole army at the same time, he likes to catch the targets one by one.

data.name: assassin_primary_desc
data.value: The assassin makes a dagger cut and deals {0} + [dice count] for damage.

data.name: assassin_skill_desc
data.value: Assassin strikes using his condition and magical essence and deals {0} + {1} + [dice count]

data.name: axeman_desc
data.value: Warriors are divided into types by the weapons they fight. The axes belong to the ruthless warriors, their strength and endurance is incredibly powerful in combat, so keep them alive.

data.name: axeman_primary_desc
data.value: The hatchet uses his weapon to deal {0} + damage [dice count].

data.name: axeman_skill_desc
data.value: The ax man uses the magic essence to create a copy of the ax, which he then casts for damage equal to {0} + [dice count]

data.name: cannot_skip_movemnt
data.value: You can only skip movement after selecting pawn

data.name: defender_desc
data.value: A member of the Royal Guard, a well-trained soldier. His main task on the battlefield is to protect his allies, but also to fight for his King. As a devoted crown for love of the country will lay his life in battle.

data.name: defender_primary_desc
data.value: The defender strikes with a sword and deals {0} + damage [dice count]

data.name: defender_skill_desc
data.value: The defender uses a magic essence to make a sweeping cut that hurts the enemy with damage of {0} + [dice count]

data.name: end_game_legend
data.value:
And as she stood dazed, he said: I gave you the gift of a Deity. You are immortal now. After that, the eldest rubbed her youngest sister's neck and saw that she had no wound. However, the old man continued: You who brought me bandages, you will be the goddess of life and you will protect them. Turning to the next one, he said: You who gave me blood and lied to me will be burdened with a curse and you will be a goddess of death and war. At the end he turned his gaze to the youngest and said: You, because of your innocence and the fact that during the trial you stood on the verge of life and death, so that no emotion torn you, you will be the goddess of fate and justice. This is how three goddesses were born: the oldest was Rhae - the goddess of life, the youngest was Carthage - the goddess of fate, and the third was Faith - the goddess of death.
Grandpa, who was the old man?
The old man, my grandson, was Saul, but now it's time to sleep.

data.name: floor_attack_desc
data.value: The sages and bards here tell stories of the sinister and feisty goddess of war named Faith. She wielded two swords in her hands and in all wars her spirit entered the strongest warriors, making them invincible, or so I heard ...

data.name: floor_attack_legend
data.value: The daughters took care of the rest of the herd, and in the evening they returned to their home. days passed until the time of fullness came. The three sisters left the house in the evening without saying anything to anyone and went to meet the wanderer. When they arrived, they found a sage. After exchanging greetings, he said: For your faith and deed, I want to give you a special gift. One that no one has yet received. He handed them blue stones, and when he directed them to the moonlight at his request, he uttered a spell. The sisters rose slightly above the ground. However, the act of the third of the sisters and her lie caused that the blood she tried began to buzz in her veins. Her eyes filled with blood and flashed with anger, and swords appeared in her hands. In a frenzy she cut the neck of her youngest sister, and when her blood dripped on the stone, a magical explosion occurred. The dust subsided and the frenzy was over. However, the youngest of the sisters lay on the road and the oldest sister wept over her. The stranger said to his sister who gave him blood: Did I not tell you not to touch the plasma?

data.name: floor_base_bonuses
data.value: There are'n any bonuses on this field

data.name: floor_base_desc
data.value: Stone slabs covering the gorge leading to Enebul. Today they will look at bloodshed and death. They will absorb the magic essence and remember the winning banners.

data.name: floor_base_legeng
data.value: A long, long time ago a family lived in a village, parents and three daughters who took care of farming and sheep farming. One afternoon, when the daughters led the flock to the pasture, passing through a forest nearby, they encountered a stranger who was wounded and lying by the road. When they heard his voice asking for help, the eldest of the sisters ran to help the wounded, and her younger sisters followed her. How can we help you ? Asked concerned, eldest daughter. I am a wanderer, I walked this forest and wolves attacked me, said the stranger and added, I need three things from you, one from each of you. The sisters looked at each other and asked. What do you need And the stranger, turning to his eldest sister, said pointing to the path: On the edge of this road you will find a nest of bees, in the middle of this nest there will be special bandages, do not be afraid of stings, none will reach you, if only you reach and close your eyes, please bring them to me.

data.name: floor_def_desc
data.value: The ancient books had on their pages a description of a kind of deity called Rhea. She was the protector of the oppressed and the weak. Her symbol was a shield, and she gave those who fled to her a blessing that protected her from death ...

data.name: floor_def_legend
data.value: He said to the youngest of daughters: Going into this forest, inside the dense purple bushes you will meet, a stone will lie. A white-brown goo will come out of the stone, take it and without looking behind, run here as soon as possible. And to his third daughter he said: There is a bowl and two swords in my purse, they have razor-sharp blades, take them and roll blood from the ram because I feel very thirsty and the water has run out, be careful not to let your blood fall on you hands. The sisters agreed and set out for the things the sage needed. When the oldest of the sisters met the nest he was talking about, they were surrounded by a cloud of bees, larger than those she had seen before. She came cautiously, and courageously closing her eyes reached into the nest, and when she felt the soft material gently pulled it out. They were bandages about which the stranger talked, took them and went back.

data.name: floor_move_desc
data.value: There are shoes on the field. According to mystical scrolls, the album was blessed by the patron of travelers and merchants - Saul. His considerations were to ensure efficiency, speed and superhuman agility ...

data.name: floor_move_legend
data.value: Meanwhile, the youngest, walking in the dense forest, noticed the dense purple bushes, as the stranger described them, and when she entered them, she saw a stone from the story and mucus escaping from it. Remembering the words of the sage, she took the substance in her hands and quickly ran to where she came from. The third of the sisters, when she was waiting for her siblings, as requested, the wanderer reached for her swords and, having killed the ram while drawing blood into the bowl, and accidentally dipped the thumb in which she was holding the bowl. To prevent the old man from noticing what happened, she surreptitiously licked her finger and wiped it on the grass. When she turned around, she noticed the sisters who were running at that moment. Having got what the old man had asked for, they took care of him. The youngest of them smeared his wounds with ointment, the oldest bandaged them, and the third of the sisters gave him blood. As a thank you, the old man told the sisters. That they would come back here at the nearest full moon at night, and he would also come and repay them, and then hit the road.

data.name: king_desc
data.value: The king is the most important person in the kingdom. He gives orders and leads his army to victory. Golden armor is his pride, and the crystals that blow it up are terrifying for the opponent.

data.name: king_primary_desc
data.value: The King swings the sword and deals {0} + damage [dice count]

data.name: king_skill_desc
data.value: The king uses the magical essence of his sword to deal huge damage {0} + [dice count]

data.name: magskill_desc
data.value: In {0} rounds, an attack with a strength of {1} dmg will be made here

data.name: mag_desc
data.value: A sage scholar in the royal libraries, knowledgeable in all kinds of magic. He can unleash hell on earth, and his power is based on the amount of magical essence that surrounds him. At first glance, the old man is slowly moving about with a cane, and he has incredible potential.

data.name: mag_primary_desc
data.value: The mage uses his craftsmanship to hit an enemy strengthened by a staff's spell, inflicting {0} + {1} / 3 + [dice count]

data.name: mag_skill_desc
data.value: The magician uses the magic scroll and marks the disc. In the next turn, powerful energy will flow to the disc, inflicting damage in the center {0} + [dice count] and near {1} + [dice count / 2].
data.comment: 0 skill attack dmg, 1 - skill attack dmg obok

data.name: quit_game_confirmation
data.value: Are You sure about quitting game?

data.name: starting_legend
data.value: Barginda Gorge, this is where the battle will take place today. Enebul, the kingdom behind the ravine at the Gulf of Enebul, flourishing with trade in blue crystals and gold, is today fighting the kingdom of Marbang, a hard-ruled empire, once an ally, now a hellish enemy. Blood, tainted by the magic of crystals that will now pour over the marble slabs blasting the ravine, will give them history and magical essence. The question, whose banners will remember ....?

data.name: start_game_bottom_title
data.value: May the power of Catarzine be with you!

data.name: stats_info
